#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include <string.h>
#define REPEAT(token, num) for (token = 0; token < num; token++)
typedef signed char byte;
//#define DEBUG
#ifdef DEBUG
#define PRINTF printf
#else
#define PRINTF(...) 1
#endif

typedef byte day;
typedef byte month;
typedef short year;
typedef short answer;
#define NUMMONTHS 12

char *months[NUMMONTHS] = {"January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"};

answer digitsSum(answer shorten) {
    answer sum = 0;
    size_t length, i;
    char store[11];
    snprintf(store, 11, "%li", shorten);
    length = strlen(store);
    REPEAT(i, length) sum += store[i]-'0';
    return sum;
}

int main() {
    day birthdate;
    month birthmonthnum = 0;
    year birthyear;
    answer luckyNumber;
    char birthmonth[10];
    scanf("%hhi %s %hi", &birthdate, &birthmonth, &birthyear);
    REPEAT(birthmonthnum, NUMMONTHS) if (!strcmp(months[birthmonthnum], birthmonth)) break;
    birthmonthnum++;
    luckyNumber = birthdate*birthmonthnum+birthyear;
    while (luckyNumber >= 10) luckyNumber = digitsSum(luckyNumber);
    printf("%hhi\n", luckyNumber);
    exit(0);
}
